DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study provide evidence effectiveness , efficiency efficacy Peizo-Corticission accelerate orthodontic tooth movement reduce orthodontic treatment time .
DOC.brief_title: Efficiency Piezo-Corticision Accelerating Orthodontic Tooth Movement
DOC.detailed_description: 1 Aim study- Part I : This prospective control clinical trial ( CCT ) , Split Mouth Design conduct assess efficiency piezo-corticision accelerate tooth movement reduce treatment time retraction canine teeth class II div 1 subject . Specific aim- Part I : A- To compare rate tooth retraction piezo-corticised conventionally orthodontically move canine B- To compare length treatment approach . 2- Objectives Study Part II : This prospective randomized control clinical trial ( RCT ) design assess efficiency piezo-corticision accelerate tooth movement reduce treatment time retraction anterior teeth class II div 1 class 1 bi-maxillary protrusive subject . Specific aim Part II : 1 . To compare rate tooth retraction piezo-corticised conventionally orthodontically move incisor 2 . To compare length treatment approach . 3 . To evaluate quality treatment outcome treatment approach accord American Board Orthodontics ( ABO ) standard .
DOC.criteria: Study Subjects Part I Part II : Inclusion : Voluntary participation patient Able follow instruction , able understand consent form sign . Adult Female Male Saudi patient 1535 y.o Subjects none smoker Subjects good health accord American Society Anesthesiology ASAI full permanent dentition regardless third molar . Subjects good periodontal gingival health : Gingival Index GI≤ 1 Subjects none gummy smile , Subjects full complement permanent cariesfree dentition ; Restored teeth proper sound intact filling Subjects without root anomaly Subjects mildmoderate skeletal dental cephalometric measurement : OB ≤ 40 % , OJ ≤ 6 , ANB ≤ 5 ° , SNGOGN ≤ 29 ° , Subjects ' dentition Angle classification class II div 1 , 3mm molar canine occlussal relationship ; subject class 1 Bimaxillary protrusion Exclusion : Subjects young 15 y.o Subjects comprehend surgical procedure consent Subjects medically classify ASAII , III Subjects take systemic local medication especially Insulin , nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug , bisphosphonate , corticosteroid Subjects pregnant Subjects smoker Subjects craniofacial syndrome : cleft lip palate ; facial trauma Subjects unhealthy compromise periodontium Subjects gummy smile Subjects inadequately treat endodontic dental filling problem Subjects previous root resorption dental developmental anomaly Subjects previous orthodontic treatment Subjects TMJ sign symptom ; Mandibular functional shift Subjects extreme skeletal dental class II : SNGOGN ≥ 32° , OJ ≥ 6mm Subjects exclude broken bracket lose coil replace immediately within day breakage loss . Subjects exclude miniscrews fail treatment Subjects become medically unfit course trial
